mdRecord.dcterms:description: Announcement of the sale of several books printed by French publisher Francois-Ambroise Didot, some being from a set of books Poeme des Jardines, by Jacques Delille, published 1780, and originally printed by order of the Count D'Artois; others being drawings from Gerusalemme liberate, published 1784. It is possible that these books were either being sold by or offered to Eliza Monroe Hay. 1 page. Manuscript. In French. Including translation. 1 page.
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Announcement of the sale of several books printed by French publisher Francois-Ambroise Didot, post 1830
